titleStmt.title: Brevis disquisitio an & quomodo vulgo dicti evangelici pontifictios, ac nominatim Val. Magnide acatholicorum credendi regula judicium solidè atque evidenter refutare queant
titleStmt.author: Magni, Valeriano, 1587-1661.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing. Publisher's name is false.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Londini"; "I" added to roman numeral imprint date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
